items.title: Commute up to 40 miles on Buzz Bicycle’s Cerana 2 e-bike at a new budget-friendly $800 low (Reg. $1,499)
items.summary:
Buzz Bicycles currently has a strong budget-friendly deal on its Cerana 2 Commuter e-bike at $799.99 shipped, which we aren’t sure yet if this is the new starting price or just a discount. It’s been going for $1,499 up until recently, with most discounts over the last year having been to $1,300, like we’re currently seeing from Walmart, though 2025 did see it go lower than ever to $999 in the last few months. Today’s deal is better than we’ve ever seen, with this being a $699 markdown that either sets a new all-time low or officially fixes the price at this low. Either way, jumping on this deal now gives you quite the budget-friendly means to commute outside of gas cars and the like through 2026 and beyond.

more…

Just make sure you also scope out the return Amazon low on Google’s new Nest Doorbell 3rd Gen as well as its  latest 3rd Gen Nest Cam Indoor, this sizable $440 price drop on Samsung’s 2025 37-inch Odyssey G7 180Hz 4K curved gaming monitor, and the up to $1,300 in savings live on its Frame TVs. The apps await below.

You’re looking at a value-packed offer today that brings four Apple Watch bands as low as $1.50 each depending on which colorways you opt for. This is just about as good as it gets, and when they cost this little, you don’t have to worry about beating them up at the gym or during work projects either.

items.title: 8BitDo’s NES-themed wireless mouse is down to just $20 today
items.summary:
8Bitdo N30 NES-style Wireless Mouse

Buy for $20 (Reg. $25)

What we love

This NES-style mouse would make for a great desk accessory as it perfectly captures the classic Nintendo aesthetic, complete with bold red left and right buttons, a D-pad-style control on the side, and a 3D touch panel for vertical scrolling. It can be a solid backup unit for your main gaming mouse or even a good everyday office mouse that adds personality to your space.

items.title: Hop on Greenworks’ 60V 42-inch CrossoverT cordless riding mower + 4x 8.0Ah batteries at $3,800 (Reg. $4,300)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the Greenworks 60V 42-inch CrossoverT Cordless Electric Riding Mower with 4x 8.0Ah batteries and 2x dual port chargers at $3,799.99 shipped, beating out the brand’s direct website by $500, where its currently posted up at its full $4,300 rate. This model has mostly kept to or near its full price over the last year, with discounts having dropped costs to $3,800, $3,700, and $3,608 for a short period during July’s Prime Day event. Today’s deal repeats the more average savings we’ve seen over 2025, giving you $500 off the going rate for the third-best price since summer 2024. You can find other deals on Greenworks push mowers in its Amazon storefront here, while the direct website has a much more extensive list of options for various riding mowers – legacy and new – while also offering varying battery packages, too.

more…

items.title: Gotrax’s R2 folding e-bike is a budget-friendly commuter with up to a 55-mile range starting from $656 (Reg. $900)
items.summary:
Amazon is currently offering the Gotrax R2 20-inch Folding Electric Bike in its white colorway at $655.99 shipped, while the black colorway is down at $687.59 shipped. This e-bike usually goes for $900 at full price, with the discounts we’ve seen in its history having dropped costs as low as $638 for the white model and $668 for the black model. The deals here give you $244 and $212 off the going rate, landing the white model at its second-best price while the black model is at its third-lowest price – both of which make solid budget-friendly options at these prices.

more…

items.title: Alienware’s popular 34-inch QD-OLED gaming monitor is down to its lowest price today at $500
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Amazon that drops Alienware’s AW3423DWF 34-inch 165Hz QD-OLED gaming monitor down to $499.99 shipped. This is originally a $900 display that has lately been fetching close to $650 in recent months. Today’s deal shaves $150 off its usual going rate, marking the return of the lowest price it first hit during the Black Friday sale a couple of months back. Dell is also matching the price for this monitor today at its online store, so be sure to snag it after getting more details below.

items.title: OpenAI invests in Sam Altman’s brain computer interface startup Merge Labs

items.title: Save up to $700 on these two Segway Navimow H series robot lawn mowers starting from $999
items.summary:
Through Segway’s official Navimow Amazon storefront, you can currently find two of the brand’s H Series Robot Lawn Mowers getting some significant savings after spending much of 2025 keeping to higher rates, with the H1500N-VF robot at $999 shipped, while the H3000N-VF robot is down at $1,299 shipped. Both of these models are no longer available direct from the brand’s website, but you can find the lesser H800-VF robot at $1,299 shipped there, making these two Amazon deals all the better, as you get more yard coverage with them. They’d normally go for $1,599 and $1,999 at full price these days, though we’ve been seeing them hold at $1,299 and $1,599 since December, with things going even lower today. While we have seen the price in past years drop further, you’re still looking at solid $600 and $700 markdowns that are worth considering while you upgrade to smarter and more autonomous mowing.
